data.value: Notice Based on the Payment Services Act
Notice Based on Laws Regarding Specified Commercial Transactions
You recieved a First-Time Match reward.
*Unclaimed items will be sent to your gift box.
Please wait for the next refill.

●Name of prepaid payment method
Red Crystal

●Issuer of prepaid payment method
Square Enix Co., Ltd.

●Payment amount for prepaid payment method
Adults: No limit
Minors:
・Under 16 years old: Up to 5,000 yen per month
・16 years and over: Up to 30,000 yen per month
Accumulated number of prepaid payment methods: 200,000
※When the number of prepaid payment methods (paid issues only) exceeds a certain number, you cannot purchase prepaid payment methods.
※Age is calculated in months, and the month after the age is reached is considered the full age.

●Validity period of prepaid payment method
Indefinite

●Complaint or consultation window
Information Center: 0570-003-399
Reception hours: Mon-Fri 11:00-19:00 (excluding Saturdays, Sundays, holidays and our designated holidays)
6-27-30 Shinjuku, Shinjuku-ku, Tokyo Shinjuku Eastside Square

●Range of use of prepaid payment method
Within the "FINAL FANTASY VII EVER CRISIS" app

●Precautions for use of prepaid payment method
Please check the provisions concerning "In-game currency" in the terms of use defined below.

●Method to check unused balance of prepaid payment method
You can check it within the "FINAL FANTASY VII EVER CRISIS" app.

●Preservation of unused balance of prepaid payment method
Our company preserves the unused balance of prepaid payment methods by depositing an amount equal to or more than half of the unused balance at the reference date (every March 31 and September 30) based on the Payment Services Act. If our company fails, etc., the holder of the unused balance has the right to receive payment preferentially from this deposit (issue guarantee money) regarding the owned unused balance, but it does not necessarily mean that the full amount is preserved.

●Policy on compensation for loss due to unauthorized use
Our company shall not be responsible for any loss incurred by the owner due to the unauthorized use of prepaid payment methods (refers to the use of prepaid payment methods by those who do not have authority against the owner's intention), except where our company is responsible based on the terms of use or laws and regulations. For inquiries about unauthorized use, please contact the "Complaint or Consultation Window" above.

●Terms of service
Please check the User Agreement ("FINAL FANTASY VII EVER CRISIS").

The following is explicitly stated based on Article 11 of the "Act on Specified Commercial Transactions" for mail order (advertising for mail order).

●Sales Operator
Square Enix Co., Ltd.

●Location
Shinjuku Eastside Square, 6-27-30 Shinjuku, Shinjuku-ku, Tokyo

●Phone Number
Information Center: 0570-003-399
Reception Hours: Mon-Fri 11:00-19:00 (excluding Saturdays, Sundays, public holidays, and our designated holidays)

●Operation Manager
Yoshinori Kitase

●Contact Email Address
msupport@square-enix.com

●Name, Type, Main Content of Service
Provision of digital content for mobile phone devices

●Sales Price
Will be displayed on the screen during the purchase procedure.

●Necessary Fees Other Than Product Price
Various expenses related to internet connection, such as communication lines

●Payment Method and Time
Based on the payment method defined by your platform.

●Delivery Time
Immediately after completion of the purchase procedure.

●Returns/Exchanges
Due to the nature of the product being digital content, returns/exchanges are not accepted.

●Operating Environment
Please check the compatible models.
